about.title: Hotel Avangarda
about.description: Hotel Avangarda is located in the heart of the charming town of Różan, providing a perfect combination of tranquility and easy access to local attractions. It's a place where tradition meets modernity, creating ideal conditions for relaxation and exploring the surroundings.

directions.car: Easy access from national road 61. Free parking available on site.
directions.public: Regular bus connections from Warsaw and Ostrołęka. The bus stop is located 200m from the hotel.

offers.title: Packages
offers.description: Our packages are the perfect way to spend time in an exceptional atmosphere. Choose an offer tailored to your needs and enjoy unforgettable moments at Hotel Avangarda.
offers.availability: Available packages change seasonally. Check current offers below or contact reception for the latest information.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Our restaurants offer a wide range of dishes that will satisfy even the most demanding palates. We invite you to taste our culinary delights.

diningDetails.title: Dzika Róża
diningDetails.description: Our restaurant is a place where you can enjoy delicious meal in a unique atmosphere. We offer a wide range of dishes that will satisfy even the most demanding palates. We invite you to taste our culinary delights.
diningDetails.specialtiesIntro: Our restaurant is famous for its exceptional dishes that combine tradition with modernity. Each dish is prepared with passion by our experienced chefs who pay attention to the smallest details and highest quality.
diningDetails.ctaDescription: Experience our exceptional cuisine and atmosphere. Call us to book your table or download our menu to explore our delicious offerings.

clubDetails.title: Klub Kula
clubDetails.description: Klub Kula is a place where you can relax and have fun. We offer a wide range of drinks and snacks, as well as a unique atmosphere that will make your evening unforgettable.

fortDetails.title: FORT No.4
fortDetails.description: The Fort is barbecue restaurant located in the heart of the city. We offer a wide range of dishes that will satisfy even the most demanding palates. We invite you to taste our culinary delights.

portDetails.title: Port
portDetails.description: Port is a place where you can relax and have fun. We offer a wide range of drinks and snacks, as well as a unique atmosphere that will make your evening unforgettable.

rooms.title: Our Rooms
rooms.description: Our hotel is located in two buildings and offers 42 comfortable rooms, including single and double rooms, family studios, and apartments. The main building has an elevator, and some rooms have a balcony with a view of the garden or the Narew River. In the external building, spacious rooms for two, three, and five people are available.

roomAmenities.tv: TV with digital and radio channels
roomAmenities.bathroom: bathroom with shower, hairdryer, and toiletries
roomAmenities.beverages: tea and coffee making facilities and mineral water

standard.name: Standard Room
standard.description: Comfortable room with garden view, perfect for couples or business travelers.

family.name: Family Room
family.description: Spacious room designed with families in mind, with additional space and amenities for children.

apartment.name: Apartment
apartment.description: Luxurious apartment with separate bedroom, living room, and kitchenette, offering the highest standard of stay and living space.

features.familyBeds: Double bed and two single beds
features.luxuryBathroom: Luxury bathroom with bathtub and shower

polish.name: Traditional Polish Dishes
polish.description: Our menu offers classic Polish dishes prepared according to traditional recipes using the highest quality local ingredients. Each dish is a journey through the rich history of Polish cuisine.

seasonal.name: Seasonal Menu
seasonal.description: Our seasonal menu changes with the seasons, using the freshest ingredients available at the time. This ensures our dishes always impress with their freshness and intensity of flavors.

desserts.name: Exceptional Desserts
desserts.description: Our pastry shop is famous for its exceptional desserts that are true works of art. Each dessert is a combination of perfect taste, texture, and aesthetics.

kids.name: For Children
kids.description: We've prepared a special menu for our youngest guests. Healthy and tasty dishes that children love, prepared with the highest quality ingredients.

spa.title: Spa & Wellness
spa.description: Welcome to our exclusive spa, where body and mind harmony is our priority. We offer comprehensive wellness, relaxing, and beautifying treatments that have been carefully selected to provide our guests with the highest level of relaxation and regeneration. Our spa is an oasis of peace where you can escape from everyday stress and immerse yourself in an atmosphere of luxury and relaxation.
spa.description2: We invite you to our modern Wellness area. For all guests, we have prepared a recreational pool, paddling pool, and jacuzzi. Adults have two saunas at their disposal - Finnish and Infrared - and a relaxation room with a heated lounger, footbaths for soaking before saunas, and an ice well to cool the body with ice flakes.
spa.wellnessSubtitle: Comprehensive treatments for body and soul
spa.wellnessDescription: Our wellness zone offers a wide selection of treatments that will help you take care of your body and mind. Our experienced therapists use the highest quality cosmetics and techniques to provide you with unforgettable experiences and visible effects.
spa.saltRoomSubtitle: Salt therapy for health and relaxation
spa.saltRoomDescription: Our salt room is a unique place where you can experience the beneficial properties of Himalayan salt. The microclimate in the salt room supports the treatment of many respiratory ailments, strengthens immunity, and has a relaxing effect on the entire body.

respiratory.title: Respiratory support
respiratory.description: helps in the treatment of asthma, allergies, and other respiratory ailments

immunity.title: Strengthening immunity
immunity.description: regular sessions in the salt room strengthen the body's natural immunity

stress.title: Relaxation and stress reduction
stress.description: the atmosphere of the salt room promotes deep relaxation and tension reduction

spa.beautyDescription: Our manicure salon offers comprehensive hand and nail care. We use the highest quality products and the latest techniques to provide you with the perfect manicure that will last for a long time.

extension.title: Nail extension
extension.description: Professional nail extension using gel method

spa.priceNote: * Prices may vary depending on the selected treatment. Detailed price list available at the spa reception.

massage.name: Relaxing massages
massage.description: A wide range of massages that will help you relax and unwind.

face.name: Facial treatments
face.description: Professional care treatments for every skin type.

body.name: Body treatments
body.description: Nourishing and rejuvenating treatments for your entire body.

seasonal.name: Seasonal treatments
seasonal.description: Special treatments that change with the seasons to address specific needs.

rituals.name: Spa rituals
rituals.description: Comprehensive rituals for body and mind, inspired by traditions from around the world.

hotStones.name: Hot Stone Massage
hotStones.description: Deeply relaxing massage using hot basalt stones.

rejuvenation.name: Luxury rejuvenating treatment
rejuvenation.description: Intensively regenerating treatment using stem cells.

chocolate.name: Chocolate ritual
chocolate.description: Nourishing ritual using natural chocolate and shea butter.

spa.poolDescription: Our luxurious swimming pool offers a perfect retreat for relaxation and recreation. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters and enjoy a refreshing swim in a tranquil environment designed for your comfort and pleasure.

temperature.title: Temperature Control
temperature.description: Maintained at the perfect temperature year-round for your comfort.

facilities.title: Premium Facilities
facilities.description: Comfortable loungers, fresh towels, and changing rooms available.

access.title: Easy Access
access.description: Complimentary for hotel guests, with day passes available for visitors.

spa.kidsPoolDescription: We've created a special swimming area just for our younger guests. Our kids' pool provides a safe and fun environment where children can splash and play under careful supervision.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Shallow depth and non-slip surfaces designed with children's safety in mind.

fun.title: Fun Elements
fun.description: Playful water features and toys to keep children entertained.

supervision.title: Supervision
supervision.description: Trained staff on hand, though parental supervision is still required.

events.title: Weddings & Events
events.description: Organize an unforgettable wedding or event in our elegant venue. We offer spacious halls, a picturesque garden, and exquisite menu that will meet the expectations of even the most demanding guests. Our experienced team will take care of every detail so you can fully enjoy this special day.
events.venuesDescription: We offer a variety of spaces that can be adapted to your needs. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a lavish wedding, we'll find the perfect solution.
events.availabilityDescription: Below you'll find a calendar with available dates for organizing a wedding or event. Green dates indicate available dates. Select a date to check details or book.
events.dateAvailable: This date is available! Contact us to discuss details.
events.downloadOfferText: Download our detailed wedding offer, which includes full menu, price packages, and all available options and additional services.

downloadOfferForm.title: Download wedding offer
downloadOfferForm.description: Fill out a short form to receive a complete wedding offer with menu and price list.

salaBankietowa.name: Banquet Hall
salaBankietowa.description: Spacious and elegant space perfect for weddings and larger events. It offers modern amenities combined with classic decor.

salaKominkowa.name: Fireplace Hall
salaKominkowa.description: An intimate space with a cozy fireplace, perfect for smaller gatherings and family celebrations in a warm atmosphere.

salaSosnowa.name: Pine Hall
salaSosnowa.description: Stylish hall with wooden design elements, combining elegance with natural charm. Perfect for medium-sized gatherings.

fortNo4.name: Fort No. 4
fortNo4.description: Unique outdoor space with historic charm. Perfect for summer events and gatherings in a natural setting.

salaBankietowa.alt: Elegant Banquet Hall with round tables
salaBankietowa.title: Banquet Hall

salaKominkowa.alt: Intimate Fireplace Hall with cozy atmosphere
salaKominkowa.title: Fireplace Hall

salaSosnowa.alt: Stylish Pine Hall with wooden elements
salaSosnowa.title: Pine Hall

business.title: Business Offer
business.description: We offer modern and fully equipped conference spaces that will meet the expectations of even the most demanding business clients. Our conference rooms are perfect for trainings, conferences, board meetings, and corporate events. We provide the highest quality service, modern audiovisual equipment, and flexible space arrangement options.
business.roomsDescription: We offer a variety of conference spaces that can be adapted to your needs. Whether you're planning a small board meeting or a large conference, we'll find the perfect solution.
business.arrangementDescription: Our conference rooms can be arranged in many ways to adapt them to the nature of your event. Below are the most popular layouts and their capacity for the selected room.
business.availabilityDescription: Below you'll find a calendar with available dates for selected conference room. Green dates indicate available dates. Select a date to check details or make a reservation.
business.roomAvailable: The room is available on this date!

downloadForm.title: Download business offer
downloadForm.description: Fill out a short form to receive a complete business offer with pricing and available arrangements.

grand.name: Grand Hall
grand.description: Our largest conference room with an area of 680m² is an ideal place for large conferences, congresses, galas, and corporate events. The room can be arranged in many ways and divided into 3 smaller spaces (340 m² each).

features.divisible: Can be divided into 2 smaller rooms

executive.name: Exec Room
executive.description: An elegant conference room (Kominkowa) designed for board meetings, client presentations, and smaller trainings. Equipped with the latest technologies and comfortable furniture.

business.name: Business Center
business.description: A functional conference room perfect for trainings, workshops, and business meetings. Bright and spacious, with access to the terrace, making it possible to organize coffee breaks outdoors.

vip.name: VIP Room
vip.description: An intimate and luxurious space designed for high-level meetings and exclusive business discussions. Premium finishes and state-of-the-art technology ensure a perfect environment for important decision-making.

theater.description: Theater layout, ideal for presentations and lectures

classroom.description: Classroom layout with tables, ideal for trainings

boardroom.description: Single large table layout, ideal for board meetings

basic.name: Basic package
basic.description: Room, AV equipment, water, coffee break

standard.name: Business package
standard.description: Room, AV equipment, 2 coffee breaks, lunch

premium.name: Premium package
premium.description: Room, AV equipment, all-day catering, technical support

rentals.title: Hourly rental
rentals.note: * Prices may vary depending on the season and additional services. We offer attractive discounts for full-day rentals.
